title: Simulation-Based Experiential Learning Design Workshop for Elementary Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary social studies curriculum knowledge and simulation tool application experience
context.additional_context: Practice-centered program for strengthening instructional design competencies in elementary social studies for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can complete the design of simulation-based social studies learning by applying the 4D model (Define-Design-Develop-Diffuse).
Learners can develop at least three experiential simulation activities reflecting core social studies concepts (e.g., citizenship, decision-making).
Learners can create simulation assessment tools (rubrics) to measure learner engagement in online environments.

resources: Digital Simulation Creation Tools (Miro, Genially, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
